query:
SELECT 
  i.tenantId,
  t.name as tenant_name,
  COUNT(*) as posicoes,
  SUM(i.quantity) as total_quantidade
FROM inventory i
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON i.tenantId = t.id
GROUP BY i.tenantId, t.name;
